page.title: 15LOCAL HISTORY
page.content:
AREA SOUTH OF WESTWOODSIDE
HAXEY GRANGE FARMHOUSE HAS BEEN DERELICT SINCE 1973. THE LAND IS NOW OWNED AND FARMED BY A FARMER IN MISTERTON. IT IS KCONSIDERED BY LTHE LOCALS LTO HAVE BEEN THE HOME OF THE ORIGINAL LANDOWNER, SURROUNDED BY HIS TENANT FARMERS. PRIOR TO THE DRAINING OF THE ISLE, STARTED IN THE 17TH CENTURY BY THE DUTCHMAN VERMUYDEN, THE AREA WAS MARSHLAND. SOCIAL CONCERN LOW FLYING AIRCRAFT FROM FINNINGLEY AIR BASE ARE THE SOURCE OF GREAT IRRITATION, PARTICULARLY FOR THE ELDERLY. THE FLAT AREA IS IDEAL FOR PRACTISING LOW FLYING MANOEUVERS. FINNINGLEY IS A TRAINING BASE SO IS OPERATIONAL DAILY. MANY COMPLAINTS ARE LODGED TO NO AVAIL.
